basic.description: This course introduces the concepts, principles, and best practices for leading and supervising employees of recreation, tourism, and event organizations.
basic.subject: LEI
basic.title: Leadership and Supervision in Recreation, Tourism and Events

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: LEI 3004, LEI 3140, LEI 3435, and LEI 3403. Corequisite: LEI 4930.
